name: AllowanceCrowdsale
description: AllowanceCrowdsale. Extension of Crowdsale where tokens are held by a wallet, which approves an allowance to the crowdsale.

eventDecorators.name: TokensPurchased
eventDecorators.description: Event for token purchase logging. Emitted when setting contract parameters.

functionDecorators.name: _getTokenAmount
functionDecorators.description: Override to extend the way in which ether is converted to tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: weiAmount
parameterDecorators.description: Value in wei to be converted into tokens.

returnDecorators.description: Number of tokens that can be purchased with the specified _weiAmount.

functionDecorators.name: buyTokens
functionDecorators.description: low level token purchase ***DO NOT OVERRIDE*** This function has a non-reentrancy guard, so it shouldn't be called by another `nonReentrant` function.

returnDecorators.description: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

functionDecorators.name: remainingTokens
functionDecorators.description: Checks the amount of tokens left in the allowance.

returnDecorators.description: Amount of tokens left in the allowance.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore. Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

returnDecorators.description: the address of the wallet that will hold the tokens.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

parameterDecorators.name: newOwner
parameterDecorators.description: The address to transfer ownership to.

returnDecorators.description: the address where funds are collected.
